meanings.definition: A borough of New York City.
meanings.sent1: I visited Manhattan last summer and saw many tall buildings.
meanings.sent2: New York City is made up of five boroughs, including Manhattan.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hot dog refuse to visit Manhattan? It couldn't handle the traffic!
meanings.sent4: In the heart of Manhattan, the city never sleeps, bustling with life.
meanings.sent5: The lights of Manhattan at night are a sight to behold, like a glowing beacon.

meanings.definition: A cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a Manhattan at the bar, and it was delicious.
meanings.sent2: The bartender mixed the perfect Manhattan for me with a cherry on top.
meanings.sent3: Why did the martini break up with the Manhattan? It couldn't handle the strong spirit!
meanings.sent4: The Manhattan cocktail is a classic drink that never goes out of style.
meanings.sent5: Sipping a Manhattan by the fireplace is a cozy way to end the day.

meanings.sent1: The bartender served my drink in a fancy Manhattan glass.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to enjoy my cocktails in a sleek Manhattan glass.
meanings.sent3: Why did the wine glass envy the Manhattan glass? It wanted to hold the classy cocktails!
meanings.sent4: The Manhattan glass adds elegance to any drink served in it.
meanings.sent5: The crystal-clear Manhattan glass sparkled under the dim lights of the bar.
